name: sammo (microsoft)
description: [项目级] A library for prompt engineering and optimization (SAMMO = Structure-aware Multi-Objective Metaprompt Optimization)。来源: https://github.com/microsoft/sammo

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A library for prompt engineering and optimization (SAMMO = Structure-aware Multi-Objective Metaprompt Optimization)

来源: https://github.com/microsoft/sammo
语言: Python
Stars: 750

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
SECURITY.md
SUPPORT.md
docs

docs/_toc.yml
docs/contributing.md
docs/index.md
docs/overview.png
docs/references.bib
docs/release_history.rst
docs/set_version.py
docs/tutorials
environment.yml
examples
examples/blog
examples/paper_instruction_tuning

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Go to the [user guide](https://microsoft.github.io/sammo/) for examples, how-tos, and API reference.

Just want to have a quick look? Try the [live demo on Binder](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/microsoft/sammo/main?urlpath=tree/docs/tutorials/quickstart.ipynb).

<!--start-->

name: sammo/sammo 模块
description: [模块级] sammo 项目的 sammo 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/microsoft/sammo

genes.title: sammo 模块说明
genes.content:
[![Latest PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/sammo.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sammo)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/microsoft/sammo/main?urlpath=tree/docs/tutorials/quickstart.ipynb)

A flexible, easy-to-use library for running and optimizing prompts for Large Language Models (LLMs).
